thread.title: Sessions pushes back on Trump's 'DISGRACEFUL' tweet

title: Sessions pushes back on Trump's 'DISGRACEFUL' tweet
text:
Sessions pushes back on Trump's 'DISGRACEFUL' tweet 12:45am IST - 01:50 
Attorney General Jeff Sessions pushed back against criticism from President Donald Trump on Wednesday over his decision to have the Justice Department inspector general - and not prosecutors - investigate alleged surveillance abuse.   
Attorney General Jeff Sessions pushed back against criticism from President Donald Trump on Wednesday over his decision to have the Justice Department inspector general - and not prosecutors - investigate alleged surveillance abuse.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/02/28/sessions-pushes-back-on-trumps-disgracef?videoId=405058434&videoChannel=13423
